article_metadata.title_en: Thousands Join Anti-Trump Protests Across US
article_metadata.text_summary_en: Thousands of people protested across the US against President Trump's recent actions, coinciding with the 250th anniversary of the American Revolutionary War. The protests, dubbed "50501," addressed various grievances, including the deportation of Kilmar Ábrego García and Trump's government efficiency initiative. While protests were largely peaceful, some confrontations occurred. Trump's approval rating is edging down, particularly concerning the economy. The article also mentions previous larger protests against Trump earlier in the month.
